trait.name: Keen Smell
text: The erina has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Hardy
text: The erina has advantage on saving throws against poison.

trait.name: Spines
text: An enemy who hits the erina with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (2d4) piercing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The erina defender makes two attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2)

action.name: Shortbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Protect
text: The erina imposes disadvantage on an attack roll made against an ally within 5 feet of the erina defender.
